mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.projectcode AS "projectcode", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.salerate AS "salerate", a.umctax AS "umctax", a.surtax AS "surtax", a.isvtax AS "isvtax", a.vtaxrate AS "vtaxrate", a.fuelrate AS "fuelrate", a.freightrate AS "freightrate", a.waterrate AS "waterrate", a.materialrate AS "materialrate", a.materialprop AS "materialprop", a.incomerate AS "incomerate", a.legalaccfund AS "legalaccfund", a.accfund AS "accfund", a.benchmarkrate AS "benchmarkrate", a.averagerate AS "averagerate", a.isaccfundwsd AS "isaccfundwsd", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_incomeset( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, projectcode, projectname, salerate, umctax, surtax, isvtax, vtaxrate, fuelrate, freightrate, waterrate, materialrate, materialprop, incomerate, legalaccfund, accfund, benchmarkrate, averagerate, isaccfundwsd, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{projectcode}, #{projectname}, #{salerate}, #{umctax}, #{surtax}, #{isvtax}, #{vtaxrate}, #{fuelrate}, #{freightrate}, #{waterrate}, #{materialrate}, #{materialprop}, #{incomerate}, #{legalaccfund}, #{accfund}, #{benchmarkrate}, #{averagerate}, #{isaccfundwsd}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_incomeset SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, projectcode = #{projectcode}, projectname = #{projectname}, salerate = #{salerate}, umctax = #{umctax}, surtax = #{surtax}, isvtax = #{isvtax}, vtaxrate = #{vtaxrate}, fuelrate = #{fuelrate}, freightrate = #{freightrate}, waterrate = #{waterrate}, materialrate = #{materialrate}, materialprop = #{materialprop}, incomerate = #{incomerate}, legalaccfund = #{legalaccfund}, accfund = #{accfund}, benchmarkrate = #{benchmarkrate}, averagerate = #{averagerate}, isaccfundwsd = #{isaccfundwsd}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
